content.detailedDescription:
I went online to ufo webcams on march 29 at approx. 8:45pm.  i saw a 
streak of light over the buildings that looked different.  i do not go to ufo webcams often so by no means am an expert of how things looked.  i saved a picture of the streak of light.  i watched it for a while.  at around 9:30pm,  i went back online and checked the webcam and the streak of light was now exiting the screen.  i took another picture.  i again watched for a while.  i once again checked the webcam again at around 10 pm and this time i was shocked to see a line of round lights.   i have no clue if webcam pictures are useful, acturate or even analyzable ( if that is a word); however, these lights were so intresting i wanted to share them.  oddly,  ufo webcam site as no address to send the pictures you save.  so i decided to send them here.  i was online when i saw the objects.  webcam does not alow for motion, can only reset to refresh image.
i felt intrigued and curious during the observation.  finaly i refreshed once and the lights were gone.
content.summary: Lights in sky on brigantine nj webcam

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were coming home from school in holly mi. we were going over i-75 on grange hall road when we noticed a big object going over us. we stopped and jumped out of the car to get a better look at it. it looked like a series of tubes making the shape of a big triangle.  suspended in the center of the triangle was a sphere that was not atached in anyway yet they were moving together.  i noticed it was a brushed siver color, with no reflection at all. now i know it to be the appearence of stainless steel.  there was no room in the sphere or tubes for a regular size human. i estimated it to be moving at about 20 miles an hour.  it was just going over the tree tops and was very large, with no noise. we jumped back in the car to follow it. we wondered if anybody else had noticed it because it was moving parallel to i-75, headed north. we raced down grange hall rd, got to dixie hwy, and made a left. we raced down dixie hwy, seeing it here and there as we started to head into grand blanc. there is a little party store at the corner of dixie and grand blanc rd that we frequented, and we ran in hoping to find another witness. we told the guy behind the conter "oh my god there is a ufo flying outside you've got to see it!" of course he thought we were out of our minds. finally we convinced him to go outside, where it was just going over the town of grand blanc. he looked at us and said "wow, oh my god!" we said "we told ya." and then we stood there and took it all in.
content.summary: Dull metallictriangular tubular craft with sphere suspended in center

content.detailedDescription:
On october 3 2009, while admiring a beautiful sunset from our deck in hidden valley lake, i decided to snap a few stills. the sky was absolutely clear of cloud formations except for one large single cloud bank over the moutains to the west. these moutains are right in the heart of the geothermal emissions in lake county, near the georhtermal poiwer plant set atop one of the highest hills.

i took a series of 4 or 5 photos with perhpas a 2 - 3 second delay between each , due to autofocus and the common delay with digital cameras. i never viewed anything out of the ordinary when taking the shots and observed nothing with the naked eye. 

i headed back into the house with the intention of uplaoding the photos to my computer and noticed the first photo had a very prominant misty globe like sphere, not shown on any other photo. 

i was very excited at finding the object and showed it to my wife who's first thought was that it was the moon, however the moon was rising in the east and could only be viewed at about 45 degrees in the front of the house directly eastward. 

the cloud which appears in the photo was absoltely static for a good 20 minutes and then within a few minute span completely dissapated leaving a cloudless sky for the reaminder of the sunset.

the interesting things to notice about the photo is the sharp detail of the trees and cloud formation compared to the misty globe like figure which has obvious motion blur towrads the cloud bank. i've had friends with photogrpahy experience take a look at it and it seems readily apparent its not a camera flash or reflection and is of a rather large size. 

aside from what the camera captured in that 300th of a second frame , there was nothing viewable from the naked eye, no noise , no pet distrubances and nothing out of the ordinary except for the fast dissapation of the cloud 10 minutes after the photos were taken.

a very exciting afternoon that has stuck with me the last 2.5 years and one of only 2 possible sightings ive ever experienced in the area. the third photo shown is the picture with adobe effect applied to it which brings out some interesting charactersitics.
content.summary: Misty white sphere like object ascending into cloud cover at dusk

content.detailedDescription: My father and i went to get dinner at olive garden in palm cost fl. we were leaving the building i saw something in the sky. i noticed it was unusual as it had 3 bright lights on each side of the triangle and a pulsating red light underneath. i had my phone with me and immediately took a picture of the object. it keep slowly floating southwest as we watch. after viewing the object my father noticed a helicopter flying in the same area as the craft we had observed. when we arrived home i showed my family and after blowing the image up we all agreed that the object was not a normal aircraft. my father is in the air force and he felt we should report the sighting as he very familiar with aircraft that normally is flown in this area. please let us know if the picture is not correct because we had trouble fiquring out how to download from the i phone to our computer. we may be reached at 3869863963 through april 2nd.
content.summary: Witnessed a triangle ufo with 3 white lights and one red pulsating light on bottom

content.detailedDescription:
The first craft was photographed on january 13 2000 and consist of arrow shaped objects that i have since videotaped with two to five attached as seen in this photo. the second craft was videotaped on october 16 2003 and has an upside down skate board appearance while the last was videptaped on september 12 2004 and has a disc like appearance. note the last has a dark seperation line between the top and its bottom section.

all were taped while the camera was facing south and sitting on a tripod. the dark section on all the photos left is the roof section of my home which i used to keep the sun off the camera lens.
content.shape: Cigar,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Flash,   Square,   Rectagular,   Other
content.summary: It consisted of a number of arrow shaped objects and traveling at a fast rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday evening monday morning 25th 26th march 2012,at approz 12.45 am ,i was driving back from perth western australia,about 2/3 rds the way to bunbury south west w.A and to my right i saw a huge green orb streak across the sky and disappear into the distant horizon,has anybody see the same thing,ive never seen anything like that before,id love to know what it was
thanks
content.summary: Green orb streaked across the western sky faster than anything i ever saw b4

content.detailedDescription:
I tonight on 3-31-12 go out on my deck to let my dog do her business. i observed a light that went basically from 1 end to my house to the other very quickly (less than 5 seconds). i don't know north , south, east, west so that is the way i explain it. i have seen and observed local planes pass over and they don't move that quickly (this was not a plane). the blinky lights emitted colors that are not common with a small plane or next size up. i have flown in planes myself. big planes don't emit this coloration. cloudy sky tonight. what i noticed, it seemed the lights stopped when i was vigorous in looking.

i have been watching my skies for at least a year. i have this feeling. on 2 occasions within the last 6 months, i believe the sky is changing. in addition, i witnessed my soda bottle twice do something strange. the soda in my 2 liter bulged up (as if it were a volcano erupting--it fell over itself-not the bottle but the liquid). 

i have a train track approximately a football field and a half from my house. when a train comes, i get ripples in my soda, not volcanic like transformations in the liquid. the movements of liquid are not geologically or train related. i theroretically (spelling sorry) think that sound is making that happen. the resonance of the sound vibrated, therefore causing my soda to do that action.

oh boy do i have this feeling----i get a lot of ringing in my ears. 

like elephants, whom emit a sound that human ears can't hear, i hear something that i can't explain. sometimes the ringing in my ears is so loud, i pop my own  ears. it helps but it is depressing. at night, i hear a hum, can't get rid of it.

i know ufo's exist!!! i know there is something out there. we are not alone!!

cloudy night--i haven't observed this phenomenon on a clear night. however, i feel stars were blocked by big objects non clear nights.
content.summary: An event that displays for months...The sky is changing....

content.detailedDescription: I was at lake tahoe with my husband and a couple of his friends in august of 2009, not positive of date. camera had not had date set, so any dates in photo are incorrect. it was mid afternoon and we had been down at the water just passed zephyr cove on hwy 50. i had taken several photo's i did not see object in the photo until recently, i was looking at some of my favorite photo's (i like to take picture with tree's, with both living and dead branches)and i noticed an odd image in this photo. i am posting the original photo as well as a cropped copy of the image alone. in the cropped image you can see what appears to be either an aura, heat, or some other form of emission generating from both top and bottom of photo. being as i did not see the image when taking photo, i cannot say if or how it was moving. i am hoping someone can tell me what it is. object is to the right of the branch i sky above the lake. second photo is cropped close up of image in first photo. if you enlarge the photo's you can see, it is the same photo, and you can see the aura or whatever it is.
content.summary: Took photo of lake tahoe through trees, noticed object after downloading to computer..

content.detailedDescription:
My older brother and i were sat on a stone wall at the side of the road [oldfield lane in oldfield. near kieghley] waiting for our father to come home from work probably around 4pm as he had a motor bike and would give us a ride down the long drive to the farm house where we lived. 
i was 4 years old. it was summer i think because it was warm and i remember only wearing a t shirt and shorts. suddenly  above the tree we were sitting under we noticed a craft hovering above us like it was watching us. it can't have been more than 20 ft above us, less i think.
we both looked at it and said that must be "thunderbird 2 " i can only remember seeing the front of the craft it was the same shape as thunderbird 2 at the front. the back half was hidden by the tree. i noticed it was a gun metal grey color, with a dull shine and small windows in odd and random places. i can't remember seeing anyone inside, or if it made a sound.
then my father must have come along and i don't remember anything after that. 
when i ask my brother now if he remembers, he says no but he is very afraid of ufos.
content.summary: Craft we thought was thunder bird 2 but a gun metal grey with small square windows in odd places.

content.detailedDescription: I was just looking up at the sky when it started from the south, it caught my attention. i knew right away it was not a plane because it stated at a tiny light and not far at all from where i was and it glowed very brightly as it came over us. by the time it glowed i had called many people to come see it. everyone saw it. i was extremely excited. 2 people were skeptical but knew it wasn't a plane. it went so far in a straight line that it disappeared like a tiny white dot. it did pulsate but not like an airplane. it's hard to explane but nothing here from earth.
content.summary: Slowly and no noise. started as a tiny ball of light, once it hovered over us, it glowed very bright. and you could see pulsating lights from behind

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling west on i-4 - mile marker 45 when i noticed just to the left 
of the interstate about 2,000 ft high, a small fireball arching from south 
to north. as it got about tree level it changed direction so it was 
flying parallel to the ground. it then started flying around as if it was 
a stunt plane (loops, swooping low to the ground, left turns, right turns).

as it continued maneuvering it began flying faster and making much tighter 
turns (impossible for a plane) and at the same time it started "shooting"
out little "baby" fireballs that immediately dropped below my view. at this 
time i can see it's actually 2 fireballs flying side by side and is  
at this time about 100-200 ft high. these fireballs had a kind of "sparkling
tail" - similar to fireworks. 

it got to a point where it looked like it was going to work itself in to 
a frenzy (circling very tight formations and spraying sparks) but then 
instead of the "baby" fireballs coming out they were now bright red orbs 
coming out. about this time everything had dropped below my view. 

i continued on my way about 8-10 miles and noticed a very bright white 
light in the sky (500-700 ft high) shine for about a second then 
disappear 3 seperate times (each time in a slightly different part of the 
sky but just ahead of me and about the same height). on the fourth time it 
flared up extremely bright and shot off to the south turning into a fireball arching down. again it leveled off just as it got to tree level and started the stunt plane kind of maneuvering. 

i noticed this time it was actually 3 fireballs side by side. it just kept 
flying around until it dropped from sight. even though it had the "sparking 
tail" it did not shoot out anything.

i would like to add that during both of these events my cell phone would not 
make any calls. it worked before, between and after just fine.

the entire event lasted about 15 minutes under a slightly hazy sky but could see stars. the first event (video 1) lasted about 2 minutes and was about 1/2 mile from me. i then traveled about 9 minutes watching the lights appear. the second event (video 2) lasted about 4 minutes.

videos were taken using a crappy camera - i'm on my way tomorrow for a new camcorder.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Huge flying display over polk city

content.detailedDescription:
Tonight (march 30, 2012) my wife and i were outside burning leaves in a burn barrel. it was a couple hours after sunset, and was totally dark. i had just added some more leaves to the fire, and looked up watching the smoke rising when i saw some multicolored lights moving through the branches of the trees above us. i pointed them out to my wife and she immediately said that she saw them also.
there were about 12 different colored lights, white, red and blue, moving in loose formation to the north. we both moved to a spot in the yard that gave us a clear view of the sky, and saw the lights clearly for about 5 to 10 seconds until they went behind the branches of a tree. we could still see them through the branches for about another 5 seconds. some of the red lights were flashing rapidly, about 3 or 4 flashes per second, the other lights were steady. the lights were about 30 degrees above the horizon to the east of us, and moved from south to north. there was no sound from the lights. we were surprised at the sighting, but not fearful or agitated at all. we both commented at how beautiful and vivid the lights were. my wife compared the size of the lights to the size of a car's headlights appearance when it is coming at you on the highway. i concur with that description.
we lost sight of the lights after they went behind the branches of a tree in our neighbors yard.
content.summary: My wife and i saw approximately 12 lights,white red and blue, moving from south to north without any sound for about 15 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work same time i always go at 6:15 am. i was heading south on treat blvd from concord to walnut creek ca. i was at the traffic light at treat and clayton rd when i first noticed it to the south west of my position. it was shining through some pine trees so i thought it was a plane or a street light at first. as i got up to the highest point on treat blvd that's when i noticed it was neither of my first thoughts. the thing that caught my attention to it was how brilliantly blinding the lights on it was. i've seen planes flying at me with the fog/landing light and i was absolutely certain it was not that.When i got to the top of treat blvd there was a clearing from the trees and houses and i could see the lights clearly. it looked like two huge white stars with a red dot or orb in the middle that was slightly lower. the thing that made me notice it is that i drive that way every day same time and roughly the same darkness and it was almost blinding to  look at it. it made the other stars look dull and the size was twice as big as any star in the sky.Plus how close they were to each other didn't even look natural. just looking at it was captivating and i almost drove my car off the road. when i pulled over is when i could tell for sure that it was stationary. there was a helicopter to the left of it over the freeway doing the morning traffic report walnut creek so i know it was not that. i live by the navel weapon station in concord and see them practice military helicopter flights once in a while it wasn't that either. something about it was different then the normal military planes i see (i'm up to date on the new vehicles because i like that kind of stuff). i tried to drive closer to take a picture but lost it behind some houses (biggest regret of my life) and i didn't have time to turn around. when i got to work i talked to my manager and he saw it while he was driving to work on the free way and got a look from a different angle. described the same thing i saw. this is something i've never seen before and i can't get it out of my mind. don't know what it was but i thought i would submit this in case anyone else saw it.
content.summary: Two huge stars with a red orb in the middle , all lights were blinding bright

content.detailedDescription: The witnesses of this sighting are my two sons along with another thirty or more people that live in my neighborhood. before the sighting, my two sons were unaware that ufos could be seen because they believed it to be fantasy and nothing more.  it was a subject that never surfaced in conversation and therefore didn't exist outside of television.  what was most disturbing were the feelings of malice that was impressed upon them by the object.  it was around 8pm on the 19 of march, 2012. an object of unknown size with blue and purple pulsing lights was moving from north to south along 19th avenue in central phoenix. it was flying at an altitude low enough that all who had witnessed it felt the object was going to land. shortly after the initial sighting began two law enforcement helicopters moved into the area in pursuit. one of the helicopters put a spotlight on the object causing it to speed off heading south toward south mountain.
content.summary: Low flying purple and blue pulsating object pursued by two helicopters using spotlights over phoenix

content.detailedDescription:
Came out of my sister's apartment after dinner and noticed 3 stationary orange lights to the north between the hospital and the block my home is situated on.  wondering what the lights were and also going to my car i was literally shocked to see a massive black triangle hovering in the sky. there were these orange lights on each point (underneath the craft) that seemed to have a seam in the middle and bulged out left and right as you were looking at them.  i went back into my sister's apartment and got her boyfriend to come out and see what i was seeing as he could not hear me yelling for him from the road.  when we got back to the road the object was moving towards the south east in the direction of baraboo, wi.  what was really odd is that as it moved it began to shut off the lights one by one starting on the right side to the top and then finally the left side (as you are looking at it).  there was also cloud bank or possibly a fog bank moving in from the east as well and this where the object headed and the lights turning off at this time - not being obscured by the cloud bank but turning off.  once the object dissappeared behind the cloud bank i went home and told my wife and son what i and my sister's boyfriend had seen and my wife related that our dog has been acting really odd and was barking at something in the sky in our living room (faces north west) and then followed something in the air (her words) through the house to our bedroom on the south east end of the house.  

i am an air force veteran - specifically security police/law enforcement specialist with security flight line experience and worked around various types of aircraft including top secret spy planes while stationed in the rok.  this was not anything i have seen in the past.  my sister's boyfriend also seen the object and tried to take pictures of it but none turned out (he was using his cellphone camera).
content.summary: Extremely large black triangle with 3 orange lights at each peak.  hovered in sky at first and when i went to get another witness it had started to move south east towards baraboo, wi and went behind an odd cloud bank or fog like structure.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a straight line of 3 lights, i thought it was orions belt and then i realized they were too far apart and they were to the east looked like it was close to butler, mo. 
the lights didnt so much blink but more of a shimmer like a white/red shimmer. theres absolutely no way they were planes or helicopters because i would have heard them and they were too still. however it did look like there were two planes that were heading to the lights. i saw two white blinking lights go towards two of the stationary lights.
content.summary: I saw a straight line of 3 lights going from ne to sw

content.detailedDescription:
We saw a straight line of 3 lights, i thought it was orions belt and then i realized they were too far apart and they were to the east looked like it was close to butler, mo. 
the lights didnt so much blink but more of a shimmer like a white/red shimmer. theres absolutely no way they were planes or helicopters because we would have heard them and they were too still. however it did look like there were two planes that were heading to the lights. we saw two white blinking lights go towards two of the stationary lights.
content.summary: We saw a straight line of 3 lights going from ne to sw

content.detailedDescription: My friend invited me to his brothers house for dinner.  during dinner, he asked his brother if he still saw ufos.  i laughed, because i thought ufos were stupid.  his brother said not to laugh, because he saw them every night.  i said i'd stay and watch for them, kind of as a joke.  but about 9 pm, after it was dark, i saw a red light appear on the horizon over a mountain far in the distance.  i thought it may be a plane, but it barely moved.  i thought perhaps a tower, but it moved far too much.  slowly, over about 15 minutes, 7 more appeared.  at this time, his brother brought out a telescope.  i looked at the dots through the telescope, and i saw red and yellow pulsing prism shapes.  i was shocked and frightened.  i've never seen anything like that, and i've believe in ufos ever since.  the scariest thing happened next.  they formed a ring shape in the sky, and circled counter clockwise.  then, one by one, they faded from view.  at one point, we saw one briefly chase an airplane.  the most interesting thing about this is supposedly these lights can be seen every night from henredon road in spruce pine, facing marion and morganton from the mountain top.
content.summary: Red and yellow prisms in the sky over appalachia

content.detailedDescription: 12:00 4 orsb
content.summary: Red orbs

content.detailedDescription:
In the morning hour of 0600 on this particular day, i drove back south to our ufo sightings area after i dropped off my fiance for work at a mine boat. 

upon my arrival i parked in the first pull off to the south where we saw the two orange orbs/ufo's in the earlier am around 0515. i sat there for a bit and decided to take pictures and videos of the canadian geese and mallard ducks. i took a few pictures and then looked up and saw a very bright white orb/ufo at 0612 in the distance over the island where helicopters and other ufo's have been seen by myself and two other family members over the months. i was very excited to see it especially during the daylight hours. it was so very, very bright and totally awesome! i then started to take videos and pictures of this ufo. observing it through the binoculars revealed it was flat, and had very bright diamond like flashing lights around the edges. it continued hovering and moving slightly inward for about 5 minutes until it appeared to tilt on its side/axis and then winked out. or so i thought. i then saw it up against the clouds with flashing white lights. it then flew east, with red/white flashing lights and quickly out of sight around the mountain ridge. on my way home, i felt really fatigued so upon arriving home 4 miles away i went back to bed and  slept in.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observed bright white orb/ufo hovering over trees on island. hovered, appeared to spin and wobble in video. tilted winked out. saw it up near clouds. it then flew east flashing lights of red&white. disappeared behind mountain ridge.

content.detailedDescription:
1. my husband and i were getting into bed when i looked out the window and noticed 2 groups of lights in the sky.

2. we observed them as they moved over the homes on our street towards ours.

3. it was clear to us it was something we had not seen before and thought they were ufo's.

4. there were two groups of lights close to one another,we are not sure if it was 2 ufo's or one with two groups of lights on it. each group of lights had 5 white lights on the bottom and one smaller red light which appeared to be ontop of it. we observed them move 1/2 a mile at a a slow and steady rate of speed until they went over our house and out of site.

5. we watched intently and opened the window to hear any sound it might have made and there was none. we both felt we had seen a ufo and were excited.

6. it went over our house and out of sight.
content.summary: Observed 2 groups of lights move silently over homes on our street

content.detailedDescription:

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard getting ready to call it a night, when i suddenly saw these glowing red/orange lights ascending over mt. olympus in utah. the mountain is west of my house. at first, i thought an airplane, but then the lights seemed to multiply above and below the mountain horizon. withing seconds there was over 8-10 of them and i realized that the majority of them were actually in alignment moving north east directly toward me.
so i realized there was a "form" to them but i couldn't see any actual "structure". just pulsating orbs/lights that appeared to have a solid mass.
the "floated", silent, fluid movement still north east direction.
i couldn't believe what i was seeing. i am a believer in ufo's but had never witnessed one. what were these things? was a really seeing a ufo/ufo's heading straight toward me. 
i realized they were heading in a direction that would take them right over my house, so i ran to my top deck and could then see that there were even more lights/orbs in a unilateral alignment "floating" north east. i ran through my house, grabbing my cell phone and a video camera and headed out the front door to the street. 
i though i would be happy......This might actually be a ufo but instead i felt uneasy and a little fearful so i was yelling for my husband and neighbors to come see. no one seemed to hear me.
when i reached the corner of 20th east, the object suddenly seemed to make an abrupt shift 90 degree's to the right and immediately vanished. like someone just turned the lights out. gone.
heading back to the house i realized that i hadn't even turned the video camera on and my cell phone only got glimpses of the ground as i was running.
i guess i was so mesmerized, i didn't even focus.
after wards, i immediately searched the internet for any news that might confirm what i saw. nothing. within 20minutes post the event, i was suddenly exhausted! couldn't keep my eyes open even though my mind was racing. i slept like a rock which is extremely unusual for me.
the whole experience has me a little nervous to be honest. i have no idea what i saw, so i guess i can officially say " i saw a ufo".
content.summary: Red/orange orbs over mt. olympus utah

content.detailedDescription: 2 orange lights hovering over lake ontario.  they did not move at all.  this is the 2nd time we have seen them.  the first time was november 3rd (3 lights that time).  this time we only saw 2 lights.  they were very bright when they were on, though they would fade out, much like a light would on a dimmer switch.  they came on and off over a 3 hours period of time.  at one point quite a few planes were in the sky flying towards it.  it got brighter and brigher and then faded out.  it would stay out for 20-45 minutes at a time, and reappear for 5-30 minutes at a time.  it was in exactly the same place it was in on november 3rd.  there had been strange clouds in the sky march 29th over the water.  when i saw the strange clouds i wondered if i was going to see the lights again... and sure enough i did.
content.summary: Orange orbs hover over lake ontario

content.detailedDescription:
I was observing the sky from the 2nd floor balcony as i often do. looking at jupiter behind me to the west i turn and find mars slightly to the southeast, north east of mars i first noticed a single solid unblinking amber light traveling east to west, then as it nears my location it turned south along 235, kept this velocity(speed/dircetional) till it was out of sight.

two helo come in form the same direction. i think to myself, oh cool they must be following that amber light. they did not, they stayed right in front of me(south of nw50th west of 235, and waited , then there were three comercial passenger p lains appear from the east, escorded by h elicopters, and small mil litery j et, they were farther north, but still east to west velocity. the helo was located between where the single light was and the passenger p lains like a buffer or sort of barrier.  i know they were passenger p lains, because at least one of them had to make two passes before landing, one of which went right over my house, silver with red stripes, americain air.

then there were five unblinking amber lights ascorted by he liocopters with blinking lights. it was very strange how the lights moved, in a (y) formation. the (y) formation was turned on its side with the top facing the direction they were traveling.  i could see the blinking lights of helo not moving as smoothly through the air. the amber lights were moving in locked positions, almost looked like a moving star constlation.  it was neat having all the other p lains, j ets, h elicopters, in the air at the same time. i mean in comparison these lights were very diffrenet from the amber lights. the lights and following helo came form a north east direction, heading west. at this time, i had to have some one else see this too. i opened the balcony back door and yelled at my fiennce to come look, he did and we both watched togather. 
while watching these lights, form the south i'm guessing tin ker a ir b ase, a small j et comes by so close got a look up it's skirt, double turb not single.  it was headed toward the lights, looked like it wanted to flank the lights north of my location. these lights come in more north than the first object or the passenger p lains had. i watched these objects move northeast till they were out of sight, kept same velocity.

this all happend within 20 or 30 min.  while these events were unfolding i noticed behind me the city was being covered by helo in a grid like fashion. i have never seen so much activity in oklahoma city sky. 
i wasn't scared when this was happing, i just tried to rationally and objectively observe.  i went through may be i just saw some new d rones being tested or something milt op, but then why were the passenger p lians involved at all, these objects must of showed  up on ra dar. the passenger p lians were being diverted away from these objects. i heard the j ets, p lains, and helo nothing abnormal. no strange sounds, and another thing the helo that were flying a grid pattern over the city did not have their spot lights on, they were not looking for anything on the ground. oh one more thing there was not a cloud in the sky.

thats all thank you
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Amber lights disturbing oklahoma city skys both commerical and militiery air craft involvement.
